misc: If not on the course, he is probably billing clients
biography: Lassi, a formidable presence hailing from Lakeside Golf Vammala, is set to make his ninth appearance at the Hector Troph√©e in 2025. A past winner of the Victor Trophy, Lassi brings a unique blend of strategic acumen and competitive spirit to the greens.

Known for his meticulous approach and unwavering focus, Lassi is a player opponents would be wise not to underestimate. His deep understanding of the game, combined with a relentless pursuit of perfection, makes him a consistent contender for the top spot.

Off the course, Lassi practices law. When he is not navigating the fairways, he can be found advising clients on legal matters. It is often joked that if Lassi is not on the golf course, he is probably billing clients.
